data.oai_dc:dc: Genotypes and pollen fertility of M. parishii x M. lewisii F2 mapping population

Genotypes of M. parishii x M. lewisii F2s (individuals organized in rows) analyzed for linkage mapping and pollen fertility. Marker names (columns) are denoted with "e" prefix (e = MgSTS). Cross denotes whether the F2 was derived from a M. parishii x M. lewisii F1 (PL), or M. lewisii x M. parishii F1 (LP), maternal parent listed first. Pollen fertility data are # fertile and # sterile grains counted. A = M. lewisii homozygote, B = M. parishii homozygote, H = heterozygous.
